name: Golf Slam - Multiplayer Games
description:
Golf Slam is the ultimate multiplayer golf shootout game! Play online and hit the ball closest to the pin to win the game!

Golf Slam is the perfect golf game for golf lovers and casual players! Challenge and battle your rivals or friends in 1v1 multiplayer golf games! Level up your golf game & skills to battle against other players around the world on the most gorgeous golf courses in live online golf battles! Compete in 1v1 or multiplayer golf games and tournaments or challenge other players to a fun shootout!

Win games to move up the leaderboards! Collect trophies and unlock exceptional golfers that will take your gameplay to a whole new level! Play on stunning 3D golf courses with graphics that will challenge your skills all the way. Swing your club and hit the ball closest to the pin to win!

GAME FEATURES:
- Battle players live from around the world in fun online multiplayer golf games.
- Play fun nearest the hole shootout golfing duels.
- Progress through more advanced levels as you master your golf skills in the chase to be the Golf Slam mobile golf game Champion.
- Unlock exceptional golfers & clubs that will take your golfing to a whole new level with awesome skills like Curl, Power or Accuracy.
- Win lockers and unlock new golf clubs, balls and diets with unique upgrade abilities such as Power, Accuracy, Spin and Curl. Power up your gameplay and battle rivals.
- Realistic in-game golf physics gives our gamers the ultimate mobile game experience.
- Supercharge your golf gameplay with different styles and unique strengths that are related to each avatar.
- Earn road to fame points and get rewarded every time you play.

Grab your golf clubs and play golf today!
